name: The Ultimate Martian Roulette
description:
CW: a game of Russian roulette

In not so far away future, the Mars colony that had been turned into one giant prison is filled to the brink with all kinds of insidious criminals from Earth. Pity them not for they are guilty of such disturbing and gruesome crimes as jaywalking, vegetarianism, being poor, attempts at unionizing, questioning authority, or other mutinous thoughts.

They are all rightfully sentenced to death. But each prisoner has been given a gracious chance to delay the inevitable death by participating in, now ranking 1st in popularity on Earth, suspense heavy, award-winning show "The Ultimate Martian Roulette" where each takes a chance to prolong their lives by one, whole, day.

Extremely exciting fun for the whole family!

But you know all of this, you've been a big fan of the show until they got you.
Now it is the time to put on your happy face and take your chances. Your game starts NOW!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
